title: Logitech K380: Best multi-device Bluetooth keyboard yet
description: The compact, smooth-operating K380 is a desktop wireless keyboard replacement that connects to up to three devices -- including tablets and phones -- and lets you toggle between them.

asset.author: CNET
asset.description: The compact, smooth-operating K380 is a desktop wireless keyboard replacement that connects to up to three devices -- including tablets and phones -- and lets you toggle between them.
